verses.verse: This is the threefold truth On which our faith depends; And with this joyful cry Worship begins and ends.
verses.refrain: Christ had died! Christ has risen! Christ will come again!
verses.verse: By this we are upheld When doubt and grief assail Our Christian fortitude And only grace avails
This is the threefold truth Which, if we hold it fast, Changes the world and us And brings us home at last.
